original_title: Storm Hawks: Tales from the Atmos
overview: Storm Hawk teens Aerrow, Piper, Finn, Stork and Junko are back for more high-flying adventures in this collection of animated tales about their efforts to defend their homeland from the evil Master Cyclonis and her minions. As their ongoing saga takes them through the clouds and rock islands of Atmos, the Storm Hawks discover portals leading to odd, uncharted worlds, where they encounter new evils and meet some decidedly strange creatures.
title: Storm Hawks: Tales from the Atmos
